events.name: Westchester County Robotics Hackathon
events.about:
Are you a Westchester County robotics hackathon team or just interested in robotics?

Join us for the Robotics Hackathon March 2-4, 2012. The Robotics Hackathon is sponsored by RobotShop.com, Google and Clearpath Robotics. The main event is located in Montreal - see main site for all the rules and requirements. Register your team for the Robotics Hackathon by February 18 to receive a free DFRobotshop Rover.

More information regarding event location to follow shortly.

Tentative Schedule:

Friday March 2

5:30pm Registration

6:00pm Opening speakers via hookup

7:00pm onwards:  Networking, team formation and installation


Saturday, March 3

All-day Hackathon

Teams may prefer to work closer to their homes, use the Google Hackathon Hangout and simply join us for start and finish of the Hackathon.

Sunday March 4

4:00pm Submission Deadline
5:00pm Presentations by teams
